name: Wordle
description: A word guessing game where you have to guess the word in 6 tries.

name: Wiki Speed Run
description: An AI agant that crate a path from one wikipedia page to another in the least amount of clicks.

name: Mouse Race
description: A 3D click game where you need to click the right element and avoid the wrong ones.

name: Is Dry
description: An arduino project that tells you when to water your plant.
